title: Body found by gym goers on a footpath in Subiaco, Perth
text:
Residents have been shocked after finding a body lying on a footpath on their way to the gym.

The body was discovered around 5.30 on Monday morning in Subiaco, Perth.

A member from the gym called police who arrived at the scene on Rokeby Road just before 6am.

A body was found on Rokeby Road in Subiaco, Perth (pictured) on Monday morning by residents on their way to the gym

The road was closed while the investigation took place but has since been re-opened, 7 News reported.

Officers taped off the area outside the Rokeby Centre and were taking statements.

A spokesperson for Western Australia Police confirmed to Daily Mail Australia that the death has been dubbed non-suspicious.

A report will be prepared for the coroner.
description: A body has been found on the footpath in Subiaco, Perth around 5.30 on Monday morning.
authors: Eliza Mcphee For Daily Mail Australia
